alert.note: Alert for Huerfano; Las Animas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 1:29PM MDT until June 11 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Huerfano County in southeastern Colorado... Western Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 200 PM MDT. * At 129 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Spanish Peaks, or 13 miles east of Indian Creek on the southeastern Spring Burn Scar, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Aguilar. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
